Articles.Content:
P-51 Mustang

Tutorial and features:

To take off, you need to be going at 65 m/s or more.

The trim must be near the 2nd notch above the default.

Adjust trim accordingly for general flight and speed. You will also need to adjust it after firing the rocket.

Landing is relatively easy, although it can bounce.

If you want to remove the rockets, takeoff is slightly easier, but there's very little improvement to maneuverability.

NOTE: You need the firespitter pack for the propeller part of the plane

DOWNLOAD

Edited May 14, 2013 by musketeer
Very cool, but you might want to rename this thread to P-51 Mustang
And how do I go about doing that? I realised my mistake after I posted...

Click 'edit post' in the first post, and then click 'Go advanced'. There should be a line at the top with the thread title in which you can edit.

Very cool. Although not at all stock. There's no point saying 'almost entirely stock', as even on non-stock piece means it won't load in unmodded games.
The music you added to your video got it blocked in the U.S. it seems.

This thing is awesome! I love the P-51, one of my most favorite fighters of all time. Unfortunately, I had to use a dang Russian proxy just to watch the vid, and was very dissapointed to learn SHOWTUNES of all things led to this video being blocked in the US. Its too ironic that I had to use a Russian proxy to bypass such a communist act. =(
The video is blocked due to copyright issues. (The US is going to hell in a bucket...lol.)
